name: cmc_bulk_scrape_coins
description: Bulk scrape detailed information for multiple cryptocurrencies from CoinMarketCap in parallel. Returns comprehensive data including price, stats, description, and tags for each coin. Use this instead of calling cmc_scrape_coin multiple times.

detailSteps.code: const nameEl = document.querySelector('[data-role="coin-name"], h1 span, h2[class*="name"]'); const symbolEl = document.querySelector('[data-role="coin-symbol"], .nameSymbol, small, span[class*="symbol"]'); const priceEl = document.querySelector('[data-test="text-cdp-price-display"], [class*="priceValue"] span, .priceValue span'); const changeEl = document.querySelector('[data-test="text-cdp-price-change"], [class*="priceChange"]'); const descEl = document.querySelector('[class*="description"] p, .about-coin p, [data-test="coin-description"] p, section p'); const bodyText = document.body.innerText; const mcMatch = bodyText.match(/Market [Cc]ap[^$]*?(\$[\d,.]+[BMTK]?)/); const volMatch = bodyText.match(/Volume \(24h\)[^$]*?(\$[\d,.]+[BMTK]?)/); const supMatch = bodyText.match(/Circulating Supply[^\d]*([\d,.]+\s*[A-Z]*)/); const rankMatch = bodyText.match(/Rank\s*#?(\d+)/i); const tagEls = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="tag"] a, [class*="badge"] a, .coin-tags a'); const tags = []; tagEls.forEach(function(el) { const t = el.textContent.trim(); if (t && t.length < 50) tags.push(t); }); const linksEls = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="link"] a, [data-test="coin-link"] a, .coin-links a'); const links = []; linksEls.forEach(function(el) { links.push({ text: el.textContent.trim(), url: el.href }); }); return { name: nameEl ? nameEl.textContent.trim() : '', symbol: symbolEl ? symbolEl.textContent.trim() : '', price: priceEl ? priceEl.textContent.trim() : '', change_24h: changeEl ? changeEl.textContent.trim() : '', market_cap: mcMatch ? mcMatch[1] : '', volume_24h: volMatch ? volMatch[1] : '', circulating_supply: supMatch ? supMatch[1] : '', rank: rankMatch ? '#' + rankMatch[1] : '', description: descEl ? descEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 500) : '', tags: tags.slice(0, 5), links: links.slice(0, 5), url: window.location.href }
detailSteps.name: coin_data
detailSteps.label: Extract full coin data
